attributes.action: keep double killer Darren Pilkingon behind bars
attributes.additional_details: double killer Darren Pilkington has murdered two people.He killed a man first got a sentence fir manslaughter .Then he was released from prison to kill a beautiful teenager called Carley Fairhurst. Carleys family ,friends and the people of wigan are horrified that a double kilker will be able to walk free maybe even to kill again
